# Installing RStudio
1. All versions of RStudio requires users to have R downloaded on before running RStudio. 
  a. It can be downloaded here: https://cran.rstudio.com/
  b. Choose the appropriate opperating system: 
    i. For Mac Users: Choose the R-3.6.0.pkg and follow installation directions 
      1. The following installation screen should appear. Press continue until the every end of the installation process. 

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE, fig.cap="Mac Installation ", out.width = '100%'}
knitr::include_graphics(here::here("Installation Images", "R_Installation_Mac_1.png"))
```  
      2. The following image will tell you when R is finished install. You can remove installation files to the trash after this step.
    
    
```{r pressure, echo=FALSE, fig.cap="Mac Installation ", out.width = '100%'}
knitr::include_graphics(here::here("Installation Images", "R_Installation_Mac_2.png"))
```
